entrypoints.name: next_header
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin next_header --release build && mv ./target/release/next_header ./build/next_header

entrypoints.name: header_range
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin header_range --release build && mv ./target/release/header_range ./build/header_range

entrypoints.name: next_header_mocha
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin next_header_mocha --release build && mv ./target/release/next_header_mocha ./build/next_header_mocha

entrypoints.name: header_range_mocha
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin header_range_mocha --release build && mv ./target/release/header_range_mocha ./build/header_range_mocha
